rules.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting

No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies

Posts that are bot generated cannot dominate the timeline.
Posts that are bot generated will be silenced to one post a day.  We prefer human interaction with the posts.
